text: Solothurn West railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Solothurn, in the Swiss canton of Solothurn. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Jura Foot and Solothurn–Moutier lines and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Solothurn West: * Regio: ** half-hourly service between and , with every other train continuing from Solothurn to . ** hourly service between and Solothurn. ** hourly service between and Olten; limited service continuing from Langendorf to and . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Solothurn Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations Category:Solothurn
title: Solothurn West railway station
